summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JobHub MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (14/14 tests passed). Frontend authentication and basic flows working, but users get stuck in onboarding loop after signup/login.

ui_bugs.issue: Users get stuck in onboarding loop after authentication - cannot access main app features

integration_issues.issue: After signup/login, users are redirected to onboarding but cannot proceed to protected routes (jobs, home, etc.)

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and features
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (basic flows work, but onboarding completion issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix onboarding completion flow - users cannot access main app features after authentication. The 'Skip for now' button on onboarding doesn't properly complete the onboarding process, causing users to be redirected back to onboarding when trying to access protected routes like /jobs, /home, /tracker, etc. Need to ensure onboarding_completed flag is set properly in the database and frontend state management.
